long_description: A dining room table for the backwoods, the TravelChair Canyon Table El Grande seats up to 6 people and folds up compactly for easy transport. Folding aluminum-slat tabletop is completely heat resistant to handle hot pots and plates. Fold-out leg assembly has individual adjustments for each leg, making it easy to get a level tabletop on uneven ground. Table height adjusts from dining table (27.5 inches) to cocktail table (33 inches) for versatility. Convenient nylon carry case included for storage and easy toting. Quick and easy setup: Remove from carry case, unroll slats, unfold legs, attach slats and adjust height.
short_description: A dining room table for the backwoods, the TravelChair Canyon Table El Grande seats up to 6 people and folds up compactly for easy transport.
